task.title: How to Set an SOP Effective Date

steps-informal.p: Important: Effective Dates must be set on a Wednesday.

ol.li: Verify that the SOP is approved in PDOCS.
Go to the Webviewer main page (http://webviewer-prd.pfizer.com/pgm/webviewer7/avr/default.aspx).
Click the New Item drop down, then Effective or Obsolete Date.
Complete the request form and click Save.
